name: La La Land 5
description: La La Land 5 is a surreal platform game. It features Biggt, who resembles a bat, a Bible salesman. Everyday Biggt wakes up, and start selling his merchandise to pink salmon villagers. Basically your goal is to reach the end of the level, symbolized by a bed, upon reaching it you start a new day and the whole salesman act starts again, but the screen gets fuzzier with every passing day.
